wardance.tooltip.parry: 至多招架%s 次攻击且有%.2d 秒冷却
wardance.tooltip.attack: 对分心目标造成%s 伤害，对无防备目标造成%s 伤害
wardance.skill: 选择释放技能（仅限战斗模式）
wardance.quickSkill: 重复上次使用的技能（仅限战斗模式）
wardance.skill.conflict: 当前在使用不兼容的技能
wardance:skills_general: 选择左侧的技能查看其描述和副技能，选择副技能后点击右侧的技能槽将其装备进技能栏。右击技能槽清空该槽装备的技能。
wardance:skills_colors: 单次只能装备一个技能的一个副技能，已装备的该技能会以红色显示。特定技能无法同时施放，与当前选择的副技能不兼容的其他技能会以橙色显示。
wardance:skills_terms:
以下描述会使用一些特定关键词：
§l减免前§r伤害不计算护甲，§l减免后§r伤害在扣除护甲和吸收后结算。
§lAffliction§r is applied to the target, and can be viewed by keeping your crosshair over the entity, like posture.
wardance:heavy_blow.base:
The next attack in 2 seconds launches a vicious strike, guaranteeing a critical hit. If the target parries the blow, their parrying hand will be disabled for 1.5 seconds. Recharges after 3 attacks, costs 1 might and 2 spirit.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the target has Iron Guard active.
wardance:heavy_blow.name: 重击
wardance:heavy_blow.desc:
2秒内下次攻击必定暴击且造成1.4倍伤害。若该次攻击被招架，束缚招架用的手1.5秒。消耗1威，三次攻击后冷却。
「重击」和目标的「不动」会相互抵消。
wardance:backstab.name: 背刺
wardance:backstab.desc: 若已冷却，攻击无防备目标时自动使用「重击」。
wardance:poise.name: 防备
wardance:poise.desc: 「重击」生效期间可免费招架攻击。
wardance:stagger.name: 威压
wardance:stagger.desc: 添加最多1.3秒缓慢和5架势伤害，越慢的武器造成的效果越明显。
wardance:vault.name: 反弹
wardance:shatter.name: 破碎
wardance:shatter.desc: 「重击」的束缚时间和伤害倍率受到自身连击倍率加成。
wardance:iron_guard.base:
Brace yourself for impact, causing the next melee parry in 1.5 seconds (no time restriction with manual parry) to reflect all posture damage back onto the attacker. Recharge after 5 parries, costs 1 spirit.
Offensive bonuses are not applied if the melee attacker had Heavy Blow active.
wardance:iron_guard.name: 不动
wardance:iron_guard.desc:
1.5秒内下次招架反弹所有架势伤害；若该次攻击为远程攻击，抛射物将会以全速被反弹回攻击者的方向。五次招架后冷却。
「不动」和攻击者的「重击」会相互抵消。
wardance:backpedal.name: 借力
wardance:backpedal.desc: 不再反弹架势，所有架势伤害转换为等量的击退。
wardance:bind.name: 束缚
wardance:bind.desc: 攻击的手将会被束缚2秒。
wardance:mikiri.name: 见切
wardance:overpower.name: 反击
wardance:overpower.desc: 额外对攻击者造成等同于招架物品攻击架势伤害的架势伤害。
wardance:recovery.name: 恢复
wardance:recovery.desc: 招架时威、灵、连击和架势的冷却立刻刷新。
wardance:coup_de_grace.base: When toggled, all damage dealt to targets with less than 20% health (including wounding) will be converted to posture. An attack on a staggered target under 20% will instantly kill. Cast when active to end this skill. Recharge after 3 skill casts.
wardance:coup_de_grace.name: 斩杀
wardance:coup_de_grace.desc: 开启后所有对20%最大生命（包括伤）以下的目标造成的近战伤害将会转换为等量的架势伤害。立刻杀死20%最大生命以下的趔趄目标，并回复1威。再次释放可关闭此技能，释放2个其他技能后冷却。
wardance:rupture.name: 爆血
wardance:rupture.desc: 吸收目标一半的灵并引爆另一半。爆炸半径为目标最大架势的平方根的两倍，对爆炸范围内的目标造成最多等同于目标灵两倍的伤害。
wardance:reinvigorate.name: 士气
wardance:reinvigorate.desc: 击杀目标后恢复该次伤害10%的生命、架势和灵，并减少等量的伤、倦、衰。
wardance:reaping.name: 收割
wardance:reaping.desc: 开启后下次普攻会攻击所有周围的目标且无视招架，造成（5%最大生命）+（攻击伤害*2）伤害，低于（5%最大生命）+（攻击伤害*2）的目标将受到真实伤害。若击杀任何目标则立刻刷新此技能，否则进入5个技能的冷却。
wardance:frenzy.name: 狂怒
wardance:frenzy.desc: 击杀目标后刷新所有物理技能。
wardance:danse_macabre.name: 死亡之舞
wardance:danse_macabre.desc: 斩杀倍率根据自身连击提高到最多40%。
wardance:kick.base: The next attack in 2 seconds only has a range of 3 blocks, but deals 4 unblockable posture damage. Recharge after 4 attacks, costs 3 spirit.
wardance:kick.name: 飞踢
wardance:kick.desc: 2秒内下次攻击只有2距离但造成6点架势伤害和1点掉落伤害。5次攻击后冷却。
wardance:trip.name: 绊脚石
wardance:trip.desc: 仅能在双方接触地面时使用，短暂减少目标60%架势回复。冷却-1。
wardance:tackle.name: 冲撞
wardance:low_sweep.name: 扫堂腿
wardance:iron_knee.name: 铁膝
wardance:iron_knee.desc: 攻击造成的击退转换为额外架势伤害。
wardance:backflip.name: 后空翻
wardance:backflip.desc: 后退并恢复30%已损失架势，获得0.4连击。
wardance:grapple.base: Landing two unarmed strikes on the same target in 3 seconds after casting this skill will grab and throw them to the ground for 8 true posture damage. Recharge after 7 attacks, costs 2 spirit.
wardance:grapple.name: 擒拿
wardance:grapple.desc: 3秒内对目标进行两次空手攻击后造成10点架势伤害。7次攻击后冷却。
wardance:suplex.name: 柔道摔
wardance:suplex.desc: 消耗自身所有架势对目标造成其两倍的真实架势伤害
wardance:submission.name: 降伏
wardance:submission.desc: 若你的护甲比目标的护甲高，只需要一次攻击且冷却-2。
wardance:reversal.name: 反转
wardance:reversal.desc: 效果改为交换双方的架势百分比。
wardance:clinch.name: 强人锁男
wardance:clinch.desc: 第一次攻击时若使用右手则束缚目标的右手，反之束缚目标的左手；若双手均为空手，同时束缚目标两只手。
wardance:shield_bash.base: In the next 2 seconds, your shield will behave as a range 3 blunt weapon once, dealing additional posture damage equivalent to its shield time. Recharge in 4 parries, costs 2 spirit.
wardance:shield_bash.name: 盾击
wardance:shield_bash.desc: 下2秒内你的盾牌可作为一个攻击距离为2的武器发起一次攻击，额外造成等同于其招架时间的架势伤害。四次招架后冷却。
wardance:rim_punch.name: 猛冲
wardance:overbear.name: 泰山压顶
wardance:overbear.desc: 架势伤害翻倍且造成招架时间双倍的伤害，若没有击倒目标则造成2.5秒缓慢。
wardance:foot_slam.name: 碾压
wardance:berserk.name: 狂战
wardance:berserk.desc: 释放和攻击后重置双手冷却且2.5秒内增加30%攻速。
wardance:arm_lock.name: 封锁
wardance:arm_lock.desc: 释放后招架将会束缚攻击者的手1.5秒，冷却+1。
wardance:war_cry.base: The passive will function until the skill enters cooldown. If cast at full posture, no might, and full spirit, this skill will simulate a full night's sleep after five seconds of not taking damage, during which time you are immobile; otherwise, you gain a series of buffs. Recharge after 5 minutes or sleeping in a bed.
wardance:war_cry.name: Meditate/War Cry
wardance:war_cry.sleep.name: Meditate
wardance:war_cry.nosleep.name: War Cry
wardance:war_cry.desc:
§lPassive:§r +50% healing. 
§l Active:§r gain the buffs of a golden apple.
wardance:wind_scar.name: 秋风扫叶
wardance:wind_scar.desc:
§被动：§r +1距离。 
§l 主动：§r 10秒内普攻会同时攻击所有范围内的目标。
wardance:timberfall.name: 萧萧落木
wardance:timberfall.desc:
§l被动：§r 攻击时附加造成的威5倍的架势伤害。 
§l 主动：§r 10秒内造成1.4倍伤害且必定暴击。
wardance:frost_fang.name: 雪原之狼
wardance:frost_fang.desc:
§l被动：§r +2幸运. 
§l 主动：§r 20秒内获得40%速度且攻击时使目标减速20% 3秒。若目标处于警惕状态，额外致盲1秒。
wardance:flame_dance.name: 风雷火炮
wardance:flame_dance.desc:
§l被动：§r 每层连击增加0.1攻速。 
§l 主动：§r 20秒内每三次攻击会暴击、造成1.5倍伤害、且为自己添加一次免费招架。
wardance:boulder_brace.name: 坚如磐石
wardance:boulder_brace.desc:
§l被动：§r 架势冷却时间减半。 
§l 主动：§r 回复所有架势，10秒内每秒无条件回复1架势。
wardance:feint.base: The next attack in 2.5 seconds tricks an alert opponent into guarding against it. If it is parried, both hands of the target will be reset; if it is not parried, all damage dealt is converted into posture damage. Cannot stagger target. §lAfflict§r: become immune to feint until distracted or unaware towards caster. Recharge in 3 attacks, costs 4 spirit.
wardance:feint.name: 佯攻
wardance:feint.desc: 2.5秒内下一次攻击若被招架则使目标双手进入冷却，若没有被招架则所有伤害转化为架势伤害。该次伤害无法击倒目标。3次攻击后冷却。
wardance:upper_hand.name: 过河拆桥
wardance:upper_hand.desc: 没有被招架时回复等量的架势。
wardance:smirking_shadow.name: 影遁
wardance:smirking_shadow.desc: 攻击后出现在目标身后2方块内的位置。
wardance:scorpion_sting.name: 蛇蝎之心
wardance:scorpion_sting.desc: 没有被招架时可触发伤害特效。
wardance:last_surprise.name: 出其不意
wardance:last_surprise.desc: 目标进入3秒的分心状态。
wardance:capricious_strike.name: Capricious Strike
wardance:capricious_strike.desc: No §laffliction§r, skill cooldown lengthened to 6 attacks.
wardance:crown_champion.base: The strong grow stronger, and the weak grow weaker.
wardance:crown_champion.name: 不怒而威
wardance:vengeful_might.name: 不共戴天
wardance:vengeful_might.desc: 受到伤害时获得10%减免前伤害的威并使攻击者发光5秒，你的连击在伤害被减免至0的情况下不会减少。
wardance:prideful_might.name: 盛气凌人
wardance:prideful_might.desc: 获得3倍的威但受到伤害时清空所有威。每获得3层威，碎裂会立刻冷却。
wardance:hidden_might.name: 深藏不露
wardance:hidden_might.desc: 无防备偷袭目标后获得0.5威。侦测距离-30%，每层威将该加成的3%转化为等量速度。
wardance:elemental_might.name: 打凤牢龙
wardance:elemental_might.desc: 攻击目标后使其受到的非物理伤害+1，当周围5方块内有生物死于非物理伤害时获得1威。
wardance:execution.base:
Costs 8 might to activate. Disables might gain, converts all dealt melee damage to posture, and takes one life's worth of health from a staggered target, ending their stagger instantly.
Monsters have an amount of lives equal to the natural logarithm of their max health minus one, and players always have three.
wardance:execution.name: 索命
wardance:execution.desc:
使用8威激活后所有来源为你的近战伤害将会转化为等量架势伤害，对趔趄状态下的目标攻击时造成1颗「魂」的真实伤害并立即结束趔趄。
生物拥有（最大生命的自然对数-1）颗「魂」，玩家拥有3颗「魂」。
wardance:onslaught.name: 势如破竹
wardance:onslaught.desc: 无视冷却，自动消耗威释放装备的「重击」变体（若无装备则默认释放「重击」）
wardance:masters_lesson.name: 开之以利
wardance:masters_lesson.desc: 激活后获得的威将会1：1转化为免费招架次数。
wardance:flare.name: 电光石火
wardance:flare.desc: 造成2颗「魂」的伤害，然后使目标快速恢复1.4颗「魂」的生命。
wardance:lichtenberg_scar.name: Lichtenberg Scar
wardance:lichtenberg_scar.desc: Drains spirit by 1/second when active to additionally record damage as charge, expiring early if spirit is fully expended. Spirit is fully drained on execution to multiply charge by (remaining spirit+1); charge is then distributed across every enemy in a 10-block radius as lightning damage, summoning a lightning bolt above each target.
wardance:crowd_pleaser.name: 喝彩
wardance:crowd_pleaser.desc: 「索命」结束后10方块内的友方单位获得时长为0.5颗「魂」的增益效果。「索命」生效期间每使用2个技能，获得额外一个增益效果并使已存在的增益效果+1强度。获得的增益效果依次为速度和力量、幸运、再生、和抗性（最大为抗性III）
wardance:memento_mori.name: 背水
wardance:memento_mori.desc: 每失去1%生命（包括伤）获得1%额外威和0.5%额外伤害。
wardance:rapid_clotting.name: 血甲
wardance:rapid_clotting.desc: 获得等同于已损失生命的护甲。
wardance:panic.name: 掠影
wardance:panic.desc: 受到伤害时制造一阵烟雾，致盲10方块内与你的距离超过（当前生命百分比*10）方块的生物。
wardance:death_denial.name: 须臾之念
wardance:death_denial.desc: 受到致命伤害时免疫所有治疗和伤害效果5秒。睡觉后冷却。
wardance:saving_throw.name: 孤注一掷
wardance:pound_of_flesh.name: 以牙还牙
wardance:pound_of_flesh.desc: 主动释放，消耗所有灵。攻击时消耗自身5%最大生命，若目标招架该次攻击则额外造成其10%最大架势的架势伤害，否则造成其最大生命5%的伤害。灵开始恢复或（消耗的灵）秒后结束状态。
wardance:descend.base: Can only be cast when standing on the ground. Until you touch the ground again, your next attack will additionally deal (fall distance*2) posture damage; performing said attack will negate fall damage. Costs 4 spirit and recharges after 6 attacks, with distracted attacks counting as 2 and unaware attacks counting as 4 attacks.
wardance:descend.name: 降灾
wardance:descend.desc: 只可在地上使用。直到你再次接触地面以前，你的攻击会额外造成（掉落距离*2）的架势伤害和（掉落距离）的跌落伤害；若成功攻击则免除本次掉落对你造成的掉落伤害。6次攻击后刷新，每次分心攻击算作2次攻击，每次无防备攻击算作4次攻击。
wardance:hawk_dive.name: 俯冲轰炸
wardance:hawk_dive.desc: Can be cast while airborne. If you are flying with an elytra, you will automatically stop flying. Every 7 blocks fallen upgrades the attack's ambush tier (alert->distracted->unaware); every upgrade beyond unaware paralyzes the target for for 3 seconds.
wardance:lights_out.name: Lights Out
wardance:lights_out.desc: If the target is staggered by this attack, it will be blinded and stagger time will be lengthened to 10 seconds, but stagger count will be set to 1.
wardance:shockwave.name: Shockwave
wardance:shockwave.desc: Landing without using the skill will create a shockwave that deals (fall distance/2) posture damage to all entities within 4 blocks, negating fall damage.
wardance:titans_fall.name: Titanfall
wardance:titans_fall.desc: Consumes all of your own posture and deal it as additional damage to the target, increased by 4% per armor point you have.
wardance:hex.base: In the next 3 seconds, your next attack will deal no damage but §lafflict§r an effect if it is not parried. Costs 4 spirit and cools down in 15 seconds.
wardance:hex.name: Hex
wardance:hex.desc: In the next 3 seconds, your next attack will deal no damage but reduce the target's luck by 2 for 10 seconds if it is not parried. Costs 3 spirit and cools down in 15 seconds.
wardance:itchy_curse.name: Itchy Curse
wardance:itchy_curse.desc: Inflicts a form of paresthesia on the target. Paresthesia lasts 3 seconds, but only ticks down if the target is not moving. For every second of paresthesia, the target will have its armor reduced by 4. Beyond 7 seconds, if the target no longer has any armor, it will be bound and immobilized for 3 seconds as it frantically scratches itself, ending the curse.
wardance:snakebite.name: Snakebite
wardance:snakebite.desc: Inflicts a minimum of poison II for 10 seconds on the target, taking the higher value for both duration and potency if the target already has poison active, and renders it incurable by milk. The target cannot heal and loses 1 oxygen per second; it will also gain 1 wounding per second until its max health equals its current health. These effects end with the poison effect.
wardance:unravel.name: Unravel
wardance:unravel.desc: This effect cannot be parried. Violently removes one level from every potion effect curable by milk on the target, creating an explosion. The size of the explosion scales with the duration of all effects on the target, up to a 10 block radius; the damage at the center of the explosion increases by 4 per removed effect and 2 per retained effect.
wardance:black_mark.name: Black Mark
wardance:black_mark.desc: Saps the target of its vitality. For 10 seconds, any creature that deals damage to the target will heal for 1/3 the dealt damage and drain either 2 posture or 3 spirit, whichever the attacker has less of, recovering half that amount.
wardance:petrify.name: Gorgon's Gaze
wardance:petrify.desc: Slowly petrifies the target. The target gains 1 armor and loses 10% speed every second. After 10 seconds, it will turn into stone, gaining 4 additional armor points but becoming completely unaware. A critical strike on such a petrified target will end petrification and cause an explosion of shrapnel that deals (target armor) damage to creatures in a (target width*target height*3) area; shrapnel damage is doubly reduced by armor.
wardance:morale.base: Regain spirit when performing certain combat actions.
wardance:morale.name: Morale
wardance:morale.desc: Regain (1/attack speed) spirit when parrying or landing a critical hit.
wardance:archers_paradox.name: Archer's Paradox
wardance:archers_paradox.desc: Regain 1 spirit when your projectile hits a target or when you attack a non-alert target. This ability has a 1.5 second cooldown between triggers.
wardance:apathy.name: Apathy
wardance:apathy.desc: You have 4 base spirit, your spirit instantly regenerates after cooldown, you are immune to burnout. Burnout accumulated will be applied if you remove this passive.
wardance:natural_sprinter.name: Natural Sprinter
wardance:natural_sprinter.desc: You are very dangerous at short distances. Your max spirit is doubled, but its regeneration speed is reduced to a third; you recover 3 spirit on a kill.
wardance:speed_demon.name: Speed Demon
wardance:speed_demon.desc: Halve spirit cooldown on a dodge and regain spirit on attack based on speed. The faster you are compared to your target, the more spirit is regenerated.
wardance:lady_luck.name: Lady Luck
wardance:lady_luck.desc: When casting a skill there is a (1+luck)/(5+luck) chance (to a minimum of 20%) to instantly refund the spirit cost of the skill. This chance stacks if it fails to trigger.
wardance:endless_might.name: 绝对压制
wardance:fighting_spirit.desc: 本技能所有变体均有被动效果，持续到主动效果进入冷却为止。满架势和灵且没有威的情况下，该技能会在不受到伤害5秒后结算一次睡眠带来的所有效果并进入冷却；否则，使用变体的主动能力。基础技能会添加10秒的再生和吸收药水效果。5分钟或睡觉后冷却。
wardance:fighting_spirit.name: 冥想/战吼
wardance:fighting_spirit.nosleep.name: 战吼
wardance:fighting_spirit.sleep.name: 冥想
